sqlMap.insert: insert into comment (id, blogId, targetId, commentType, writerId,contents, dateCreated) values(#id#, #blog.id#, #targetId#, #type#, #writer.loginId#, #contents#, #dateCreated#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT c.id as id FROM comment c where c.blogId = #blogId# and c.targetId = #targetId# and c.commentType = #type# order by c.id desc limit 1

SELECT c.id as id, c.blogId as "blog.id", c.targetId as targetId, c.commentType as type, c.writerId as "writer.loginId", c.contents as contents, c.dateCreated as dateCreated FROM comment c where c.blogId = #blogId# and c.targetId = #targetId# and c.commentType = #type# order by c.id desc
